means: 吓唬，欺凌( hector的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In a loud, hectoring tone, Alan told us that he wasn't going to waste time discussing nonsense.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾伦大声威逼我们说，他不会把时间浪费在讨论没用的事情上。

sentence.Network_en: Huffing, bouncing , hectoring fellows do not possess cool courage.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱叫的狗不咬人(嘘声恫吓的人很少见诸行动).

sentence.Network_en: Nevertheless, Thatcher's sometimes hectoring, sometimes condescending manner irritated many voters.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管如此, 撒切尔的风格还是惹恼了许多选民.

list.abs: The authors avoid a hectoring tone ., 作者们避免了虚张声势的语调.
离离原上草 - 搜搜百科 ... 片长：143 min 导演：巴本科·埃克托 Babenco Hector 编剧： William Kennedy ....novel/screenplay.
where hector was the first of the gang ., 赫克托是队伍的第一个人.
He could not stand her hectoring moralism ., 他无法忍受她居高临下的说教.

entry.def: If you say that someone is hectoring you, you do not like the way they are trying to make you do something by bothering you and talking to you aggressively.

example.ex: I suppose you'll hector me until I phone him.
example.tran: 我想若是我不给他打电话，你就会一直威吓我。

auth_sentence.content: So I think your badgering and hectoring speaks for itself.
auth_sentence.res_content: So I think your badgering and hectoring speaks for itself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So I think your badgering and hectoring speaks for itself.

auth_sentence.content: Now, bored with all-nighters, it's those still awake that she's hectoring.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now, bored with all-nighters, it's those still awake that she's hectoring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, bored with all-nighters, it's those still awake that she's hectoring.

auth_sentence.content: But Mr Lansley said it was time to move away from hectoring people to lead healthier lives.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Mr Lansley said it was time to move away from hectoring people to lead healthier lives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Mr Lansley said it was time to move away from hectoring people to lead healthier lives.
